channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 印度航空首席执行官坎贝尔-威尔逊（Campbell Wilson）说，印度航空业发展迅速，除孟买和德里外，印度至少还能支持一个国际枢纽的建设。
item.description:
India’s airline industry is growing so fast that the country could support at least one other international hub beyond Mumbai and Delhi, Campbell Wilson, the CEO of Air India, says https://t.co/ZyxLoYPsSg

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 他们凭借 300 亿美元的零售帝国成为超级富豪。但现在，英国伊萨兄弟的警示灯正在闪烁
item.description:
They turbocharged their $30 billion retail empire to become super rich.

But now warning lights are flashing for the UK's Issa brothers https://t.co/wi88klehw3

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 大谷翔平将不会是周三首尔高尺巨蛋球场唯一的贵宾，K-pop 偶像、明星运动员和政府官员将在 MLB 赛季揭幕战上向世界展示韩国的风采。
item.description:
Shohei Ohtani won’t be the only VIP present at Seoul’s Gocheok Sky Dome on Wednesday as K-pop idols, celebrity athletes and government officials join the opportunity to showcase South Korea to the world at the MLB season opener https://t.co/ErXQZ5oozi

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 据说美国将考虑制裁华为芯片网络
item.description:
The US is said to consider sanctioning Huawei’s chip network https://t.co/gODUQC3Xu3

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 在欧洲开始新的一天需要知道的五件事
item.description:
Five things you need to know to start your day in Europe https://t.co/T3tQeAkFRC

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 欧盟将公布利用冻结的俄罗斯资产利润帮助乌克兰的建议，而美国急需的援助方案仍被国会搁置。阅读布鲁塞尔版
item.description:
The EU will unveil proposals to use profits from frozen Russian assets to help Ukraine, as a much-needed US aid package remains stuck in Congress. Read the Brussels Edition https://t.co/qIEhy0HV6B

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 汇丰银行私人信贷亚洲区主管 Bo Hu 表示，私人信贷投资者在中国的投资机会正从房地产市场转向科技领域。
item.description:
Private credit investors’ opportunities in China are shifting from the property market to tech, according to Bo Hu, head of private credit Asia at HSBC https://t.co/zEHdtdHY5G

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 中国对非银行金融机构的贷款在 2 月份出现了 7 年来最大的增长，这引发了人们的猜测，因为这有助于国有资金购买股票以帮助阻止市场崩溃
item.description:
China’s loans to non-bank financial institutions surged in February by the most in 7 years, prompting speculation it helped state funds as they bought shares to aid in stemming a market rout https://t.co/TbErbmfrwg

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 波兰执政党将在几天内向议会提交一份动议，开始对央行行长亚当-格拉平斯基进行调查
item.description:
Poland’s ruling party will submit a motion in parliament within days to start a probe of central bank Governor Adam Glapinski https://t.co/IMqaY7huHb

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 马来西亚央行警告称，在对全球货币政策的预期不断波动的情况下，林吉特的前景可能仍然不均衡
item.description:
Malaysia’s central bank cautions that the ringgit’s outlook may remain uneven amid fluctuating expectations on global monetary policy https://t.co/OVrgRJESZh

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 北马其顿央行行长称，加入欧盟的谈判缺乏进展正在驱赶投资者
item.description:
North Macedonia’s central bank governor says the lack of progress in talks to join the European Union is driving away investors https://t.co/nm0q4CVH1I

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 独家报道外国投资者将与赞比亚官员重启谈判，以达成一项重组 30 亿美元全球债券的协议，这标志着这个非洲国家多年来摆脱违约的努力可能出现转折点
item.description:
Exclusive: Foreign investors are set to restart talks with Zambia officials on a deal to restructure $3 billion of global bonds, marking a potential turning point in the African nation’s years-long effort to lift itself out of default https://t.co/dXsv36eqYX

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: @johnauthers 说："对于美联储的'春季仪式'而言，通胀担忧正在蔓延。美联储会议不能忽视基金经理的警告，他们现在对经济过热的担忧超过了对经济衰退的担忧
item.description:
Inflation fears are blooming for the Fed's rite of spring, says @johnauthers. Their meeting can't ignore the warning from fund managers who now fear overheating in the economy more than recession https://t.co/fln8QdSvPp

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 欧盟更接近于将对乌克兰的贸易支持再延长一年，同时制定更强有力的保障措施，以防止某些产品的进口量过高
item.description:
The EU got closer to extending trade support for Ukraine for another year, while creating stronger safeguards to prevent imports of certain products getting too high https://t.co/baqsewzIcc

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 非洲最大的交易所 JSE 预计将在两个月内开始碳抵消交易
item.description:
Africa's biggest exchange, JSE, expects to start trading carbon offsets within two months https://t.co/fnITFtYjTc

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）初步批准巴基斯坦发放 30 亿美元救助计划的最后一笔资金
item.description:
Pakistan secures initial approval from the IMF for the release of the final tranche from a $3 billion bailout program https://t.co/JL5o6ynFq8

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 如果瑞士央行在今年的首次决策中违背预期，降低利率，那么少数几家银行将从中获利
item.description:
A handful of banks stand to profit if the Swiss central bank goes against forecasts and cuts rates at its first decision of the year https://t.co/z5AN8DGSb6

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 在利率飙升和房价暴跌导致房屋建筑业萎缩之后，瑞典的房屋建筑业出现了初步复苏迹象
item.description:
Sweden’s home construction sector is showing tentative signs of recovery after shrinking as interest rates surged and housing prices plunged https://t.co/1EfRTymskz

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: @MerrynSW 写道：确保人工智能革命步入正轨意味着要建造更多的核电站
item.description:
Ensuring the AI revolution stays on track means building out a lot more nuclear-power stations, writes @MerrynSW https://t.co/kX8iqN7Ujj

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 一项调查显示，美国加密公司提供的薪酬待遇明显高于海外竞争对手，其中一些公司的薪酬高达 30 万美元
item.description:
US crypto companies offer significantly higher compensation packages than overseas rivals, including salaries of $300,000 for some, according to a survey https://t.co/Ph3Uz2XfR2

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 他们凭借 300 亿美元的零售帝国成为超级富豪。但现在，英国伊萨兄弟的警示灯正在闪烁
item.description:
They turbocharged their $30 billion retail empire to become super rich. But now warning lights are flashing for the UK's Issa brothers https://t.co/nGkUjANIh3

item.title: 泰国宪法法院要求在一份寻求解散泰国最大反对党的请愿书中提供更多文件
item.description:
Thailand’s Constitutional Court called for more documents in a petition seeking to disband the nation’s largest opposition party https://t.co/fLrBkyhGxd

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 消息人士称，在电信巨头华为去年取得重大技术突破后，美国正考虑将多家与华为有关联的中国半导体公司列入黑名单
item.description:
The US is considering blacklisting a number of Chinese semiconductor firms linked to Huawei after the telecom giant notched a significant technological breakthrough last year, sources say https://t.co/NrMoOcP3F4

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 摩根大通称大选后印度股市有望吸引更多外资流入
item.description:
Indian equities are poised to lure more foreign inflows after the general elections, JPMorgan says https://t.co/XOutbSfWZk

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 日本央行在没有明确指引的情况下结束负利率后，日元兑美元汇率面临跌回三十年低点的风险
item.description:
The yen is at risk of sliding back to three-decade lows against the dollar after the Bank of Japan ended negative interest rates without clear guidance https://t.co/iEUe1QSae0

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 乌克兰无人机袭击了俄罗斯至少九家主要炼油厂，标志着基辅反对弗拉基米尔-普京入侵的斗争进入了一个新阶段
item.description:
Ukrainian drones have struck at least nine major oil refineries in Russia, marking a new phase in Kyiv's fight against Vladimir Putin's invasion https://t.co/IhaakvdYSm

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 香港刚刚以创纪录的速度通过了本地安全法，既安抚了北京，又与西方政府对立。现在，香港面临着巩固其国际金融中心地位的艰巨任务。
item.description:
Hong Kong just passed its local security law at record speed, placating Beijing and antagonizing Western governments. It now has the challenging task of bolstering the city’s position as an international finance center. https://t.co/v4XBZi8Yyc

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 比特币徘徊在约两周来的最低水平附近，受到 ETF 流入降温和对美联储降息幅度的担忧的影响
item.description:
Bitcoin hovered near the lowest level in about two weeks, sapped by cooling ETF inflows and worries over how much the Fed can cut interest rates https://t.co/utNrME5yMo

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 据美联社报道，亿万富翁慈善家兼作家麦肯齐-斯科特（MacKenzie Scott）表示，她将向 361 家小型非营利组织捐赠 6.4 亿美元，是她通过公开征集承诺捐赠额的两倍多。
item.description:
Billionaire philanthropist and author MacKenzie Scott says she is giving $640 million to 361 small nonprofits, more than double what she pledged to give away through an open call, AP reports https://t.co/uvGEOsklQx

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 澳大利亚正在为中国第二高级领导人李强总理的来访做准备，这表明堪培拉与北京之间的关系并未因最近的挫折而受到破坏
item.description:
Australia is preparing for a visit by Chinese Premier Li Qiang, the country’s second-most senior leader, in a sign that relations between Canberra and Beijing weren’t upended by recent setbacks https://t.co/Pjx6BFEaDj

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024
